root.name: Label Extractor
root.description: Extracts labeled objects from a binary or labeled image into ROI using connected component analysis
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:
- Version 1.4.1.1 Date 2017-06-07 17:43:55
Make the plugin compatible for Java 1.6 (for the oldies still out there)
- Version 1.4.1.0 Date 2017-06-07 15:13:39
Fixed an issue where the disk caching method (in 3D) would not work properly (due to file access permissions)
- Version 1.4.0.0 Date 2016-02-02 19:56:32
* NEW: 3D extraction is now cached on disk (to some extent) to save memory (only minimal loss of performance) * Pretty print the constant names
- Version 1.3.0.0 Date 2015-08-05 20:05:11
Adjusted the name of the extracted ROI to indicate the original (extracted) label value
- Version 1.2.1.0 Date 2015-03-19 16:37:34
Labels now have a automated numbering in their name for easier interpretation
- Version 1.2.0.0 Date 2014-08-05 20:18:16
Major speed boost of the standalone version (slowness was due to the ROI export)
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2014-05-12 21:20:36
Made methods static for script access
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2014-02-12 19:09:12
Stable release. Fixed an issue causing several empty ROI to be created in some cases
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2014-01-23 18:47:46
